content: i make these using up my leftover yarn i also made a bunch for my oldest daughter using up some novelty yarn i had no clue what to do with i ve probably made a hundred or so of these in the last year alone all the girls in my family except one love them it takes appx 5 oz of yarn to make one **note** i use this pattern for all my plastic hangers if it has hooks on the inside that are removable i use wire cutters to remove them i prefer to use hangers that are molded all in one piece and without hooks or wide ends
